text: Heartwood is a 1998 American independent drama film written and directed by Lanny Cotler and starring Jason Robards and Hilary Swank. ==Plot== ==Cast== *Jason Robards as Logan Reeser *Eddie Mills as Frank Burris *Hilary Swank as Sylvia Orsini *John Terry as Joe Orsini *Randall Batinkoff as Johnny Purfitt *John Dennis Johnston as Carl Burris ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 films Category:American films Category:American drama films Category:American independent films
title: Heartwood (film)
